summary: UPON READING INFORMATION ABOUT THE PAST FAILURES OF THE GEN 3 SEAT BELT I WENT TO MY 2000 DODGE CARAVAN SPORT AND SAT IN THE SEAT PUT THE SEAT BELT ON AND DROPPED A LIGHT SHOE ON THE SEAT BUCKLE. I IMMEDIATELY SNAPPED OPEN, AND I WAS STUNNED. THIS IS MY SECOND CARAVAN AND I HAD ALWAYS THOUGHT THAT IT WAS A SAFE VEHICLE TO TRANSPORT MY SELF ,MY HUSBAND AND MY 4 CHILDREN IN. I NOW FEEL VERY DIFFERENTLY.  *NLM
